chapter.para: ∩ uses a number of automatically generated secrets for use internally. These secrets have a default expiration of 10950 days and are set through the CERT_EXPIRATION property in the env: section of the &values-filename; file. If rotation of the secrets is required, increment the value of secrets_generation_counter in the kube: section of the &values-filename; configuration file (for example the example &values-filename; used in this guide) then run helm upgrade.
This example demonstrates rotating the secrets of the scf deployment.
chapter.screen: kube: # Increment this counter to rotate all generated secrets secrets_generation_counter: 2
chapter.para: Next, perform a helm upgrade to apply the change.
